name: com.unity.terrain-tools
description: The Terrain Tools package adds additional Terrain sculpting brushes and tools to Unity. This add-on toolset is suitable if you require more control over the appearance of your Terrain, and want to streamline Terrain workflows. Itâ€™s also useful when you want to make more complex-looking Terrain, or author Terrain Texture data in external digital content creation tools.

### Fixed:
- Fixed issue where new tests were not set to be internal, causing internal checks to fail.
